alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Montgomery; Pike (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 10:16PM CST until December 15 at 10:30PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN CALHOUN COUNTY IN SOUTHWESTERN ILLINOIS...PIKE AND BROWN COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL ILLINOIS...NORTHWESTERN LINCOLN... NORTHEASTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL MISSOURI AND PIKE COUNTIES IN NORTHEASTERN MISSOURI... At 1015 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Rushville to Bellflower, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bowling Green, Pittsfield, Louisiana, Montgomery City, Mount Sterling, Griggsville, Davis, Pleasant Hill, New Florence, Atlas, Eolia, Clarksville, Bellflower, Pike, Buckhorn, Buell, New Hartford, Tarrants, Independence and Versailles. This includes Interstate 72 between exits 31 and 35. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
